Go is a personal attempt to develop a women safety app, that unlike its predecessors, offers a wide range of basic but vital functions for any user.


Have you ever been in a situation where you wish you could quickly send an SOS call/message to the ones near and dear to you ? This app lets you do just that.


Go lets you send text messages to 10 contacts, call a contact, and lock your phone, all by one tap. It also has a variety of other features that might prove to be useful in such situations.


The features were developed while keeping in mind that the user might not have top-tier connectivity at all times, and thus can't depend on the Internet for everything.


The project will shortly go open-source, i.e. It will be made open to developers globally, so that the willing ones can contribute to the app, thus improving it over time.
